5.title: Entering the World Martial Arts Tournament! Goten Shows Off His Explosive Power During Training!
5.plot: After Gohan spreads word of the tournament to the others as well as managing to convince Chi-Chi to let him participate himself, Gohan takes a leave of absence from school and begins training with Goten. Gohan is surprised to find that Goten not only possesses great strength, but he is also already capable of transforming into a Super Saiyan even though he has yet to learn how to fly. Videl comes around to have Gohan make good on his promise to teach her how to fly.

1.title: The Curtain Opens on the Battle! Son Goku Returns
1.plot: The episode begins telling the story of Goku up to the present of the series. The episode goes on to introduce his son Gohan, named after Goku's grandfather. Although a stranger appears in a space pod in search of someone by the name of Kakarot. Who is he, and who is Kakarot?

2.title: Teki wa Gokû no ani!? Saikyô senshi Saiya-jin no himitsu
2.plot: The stranger reveals himself to Goku and his friends, as well as Goku's origin. Goku then tries to deny the information given to him. Is the stranger good or evil?

3.title: A Battle with Their Lives on the Line! Goku and Piccolo's Fierce Suicidal Attack!
3.plot: Despite the fury of their attacks, Goku and Piccolo are unable to land a death blow in their battle against Raditz. Gohan's unexpected outburst manages to weaken the powerful Saiyan, but it may be too little, too late.

4.title: Gotta Run in the Afterlife, Son Goku! The One Million Kilometer Snake Road
4.plot: Now that he's dead, Goku must fight to survive in the afterlife, especially during his treacherous trek down Snake Way. Back on Earth, Gohan endures his own punishment as a student in the house of Piccolo!

5.title: Survival at Wildness! The Moonnight Lets Gohan Watch Further!
5.plot: Piccolo tries to toughen up Gohan with some wilderness survival training, but things get hairy when the young Saiyan sees his first full moon! Meanwhile, Yajirobe summons Earth's strongest fighters to Kami's Lookout.

6.title: Final Reached the End! The Strange Exam of Kaio
6.plot: As the deadly Saiyan invaders approach Earth, Gohan makes slow, but steady, progress under the watchful eye of Piccolo, and Goku struggles with the "gravity" of his training under King Kai.

7.title: Battle with 10-Fold Gravity! Goku, Your Training in a Footrace
7.plot: To prove himself worthy of King Kai's training, Goku must test his mettle against a fleet-footed monkey and a powerful cricket that's big on respect. Meanwhile, in the land of the living, Gohan takes a beating from his monstrous master!

8.title: Come Forth, Shenron! The Saiya-jin Finally Arrive on Earth
8.plot: Goku's training under King Kai is finally complete, and he's eager to return to Earth. Master Roshi uses the Dragon Balls to summon Shenron, but will Goku make it back in time to stop the Saiyans?

9.title: Yamcha's Hard Struggle! The Terrifying Saibaimen
9.plot: The Saiyans have arrived, Goku isn't even on the planet, and the overmatched Z-Fighters represent Earth's last line of defense. When Vegeta and Nappa unleash the gruesome Saibamen, Yamcha picks a fight that could be his last!

10.title: Wait, Chaozu!! Tenshinhan's Screaming Kikoho
10.plot: Krillin's furious attack wipes out the Saibamen, but the Z-Fighters are powerless against the Saiyan warlords. One by one, Earth's defenders suffer devastating injuries - or fall in battle. Goku's return is their only hope for survival.

11.title: Will Son Goku Make It?! The Battle Resumes in 3 Hours
11.plot: Piccolo hatches a desperate plan to prolong the battle until Goku's arrival. When Vegeta senses an awesome source of power approaching, he orders Nappa to dispose of remaining Z-Fighters - starting with Gohan!

12.title: The Tears Piccolo Shed... Son Goku's Furious Counterattack!
12.plot: Goku arrives in time to save Gohan and Krillin, and the resurrected warrior is eager to put the hurt on Nappa. When it becomes clear that Goku is no ordinary fighter, Prince Vegeta steps into to finish the fight himself!

13.title: This Is the Kaio-ken!! A Battle to the Limit: Goku vs Vegeta
13.plot: The stage is set for a final showdown between Vegeta and Goku. The Saiyan Prince is stronger, faster, and far more ruthless. Goku's only hope for victory is a technique that may very well destroy him!

14.title: Kamehameha Clash! Vegeta's Tenacious Grand Transformation
14.plot: Vegeta can't handle the fury of Goku's triple Kaio-Ken technique, so the Saiyan warlord unleashes his inner ape. Weakened by his furious onslaught, Goku's only hope to defeat the beast is the mighty Spirit Bomb!

15.title: Goku in Absolute Peril! Entrust Your Wishes to the Genki-dama
15.plot: As Goku lies exhausted and vulnerable on the field of battle, Gohan and Krillin take aim at Vegeta's only weakness: his tail! If they can take the ape out of the fight, they might have a chance to escape with their lives.

16.title: The Invincible Vegeta Defeated! Son Gohan Summons a Miracle
16.plot: Krillin and Gohan team up to blast Vegeta with a Spirit Bomb, but the Saiyan prince refuses to die. Things look bad for the Z-Fighters until Yajirobe distracts the enemy long enough for Gohan to undergo a transformation of his own!

17.title: Dawn of the Fierce Battle... The Planet of Hope Is Piccolo's Homeland
17.plot: Vegeta has been defeated, but there's no time to celebrate. The Z-Fighters must find a way to resurrect the friends who died stopping the Saiyan invasion. Fortunately for the fallen, Krillin has a plan!

18.title: The Spaceship that Sleeps in Yunzabit! Blast Off for Planet Namek
18.plot: Preparations for the journey to Namek hit a snag when Bulma accidentally blows up the remaining Saiyan spaceship. Mr. Popo may know of another vessel, so he and Bulma travel to the Earth's end for a closer look.

19.title: A Formidable New Enemy! Emperor of the Universe, Freeza
19.plot: A bad case of space boredom makes Bulma a pain to share close quarters with, and Vegeta recovers from his injuries only to discover that Frieza has a head start on tracking down the magic Dragon Balls!

20.title: Rebellion Against Freeza! Vegeta, Burning with Ambition
20.plot: Gohan and Krillin beat up on Frieza's henchmen, but their spaceship is destroyed in the process. Vegeta is headed for a showdown with Cui, and the shrewd Saiyan is keeping his true power level under wraps!

21.title: Protect the Dragonballs! The Namekian Offensive
21.plot: Goku blasts off in a brand new spaceship specially equipped with a device designed to help increase his strength! On Namek, Krillin and Gohan watch in horror as Frieza's men slaughter innocent Namekians.

22.title: Dodoria in Terrifying Hot Pursuit! Vegeta Learns the Truth
22.plot: Gohan and Krillin risk their lives to rescue a young Namekian, and Vegeta goes on the rampage after learning the truth about the destruction of his home planet!

23.title: Vegeta's Secret Maneuvering! The Namekians Are Tragically Attacked
23.plot: After easily defeating Dodoria, Vegeta begins his violent search for the two remaining Dragon Balls. Meanwhile, Krillin and his new friend Dende set out to warn the eldest Namekian of the horror headed his way!

24.title: Resurrected Comrades! The Handsome Warrior Zarbon's Devilish Transformation
24.plot: King Kai telepathically "phones" Goku with a warning to stay as far away from Frieza as possible! Back on Namek, Vegeta is shocked to discover how much a simple transformation can increase Zarbon's power.

25.title: Its a Power-Up, Krillin! Freeza's Nagging Premonition
25.plot: The eldest Namekian unlocks the full force of Krillin's dormant power, so the bald brawler can better protect his Dragon Ball. Elsewhere, a Saiyan-related premonition prompts Frieze to call for reinforcements.

26.title: The Plot Is Smashed! The Counterattack, Vegeta vs. Zarbon
26.plot: Vegeta lays it on the line in a daring attempt to steal the Dragon Balls right out from under Frieza's nose. Krillin's riding high on a Namekian power surge, but he's about to wander into a dogfight he can't survive!

27.title: A Hair-Trigger Pinch! Gohan, Protect the Four-Star-Ball
27.plot: Intimidated by Vegeta's superior strength, Krillin reluctantly surrenders his precious Dragon Ball. A glimmer of hope remains after Gohan secures a ball of his own - but the young warrior is headed for a beat-down courtesy of Vegeta!

28.title: The Super Decisive Battle Draws Near! The Ginyu Special-Squad Has Arrived!
28.plot: Vegeta intercepts Krillin and Gohan on their mad dash to get powered up by the Eldest Namekian, but larger problems loom on the horizon. Brace yourselves for the arrival of the Ginyu Force!

29.title: The Special-Squad's Frontline Man! Break Gurudo's Spell
29.plot: Gohan and Krillin fight to survive against Guldo, a member of the Ginyu Force who possesses awesome psychic abilities! With Goku still in space and Vegeta their only ally, things look bleak for Earth's heroes.

30.title: The Hellish Rikuum! Keep Me Entertained, Vegeta-chan
30.plot: Vegeta ramps his battle power up to impressive levels, but he's still no match for the Ginyu goons. To escape death, he'll need help from some heroic former enemies. Meanwhile, Frieza tries to unlock the magic of the Dragon Balls!

31.title: Son Goku Finally Arrives! Knock the Ginyu Special-Squad Around
31.plot: At long last, Goku finally completes his journey from Earth and arrives on planet Namek. His friends are gravely injured, but the mighty Saiyan warrior has a bag full of magic beans and a powerful secret!

32.title: The Star Performer Takes the Stage?! Captain Ginyu vs Son Goku
32.plot: As Frieza prepares for his ruthless interrogation of the Eldest Namekian, Goku shows off the benefits of training in gravity one hundred times that of Earth. Will it be enough to help him defeat Captain Ginyu?

33.title: Son Goku at Full Power! The Terrified Ginyu Has Something Up His Sleeve?!
33.plot: Frieza locates the Eldest Namekian, but Nail intercepts the evil entity, risking his own life to preserve the Dragon Balls. Elsewhere, Gohan and Krillin rescue a damsel from some dinosaurs, and Goku continues his battle with Cpt. Ginyu.

34.title: Surprise! Goku Is Ginyu and Ginyu Is Goku?!
34.plot: Gohan and Krillin unearth the Dragon Balls, but their attempts to summon Shenron fail miserably. Later, Cpt. Ginyu's devious strategy forces Earth's warriors to do the unthinkable: attack Goku's flesh and bones with chilling ferocity!

35.title: A Great Turnabout for Goku?! Super Shenron, Come Out Right Now!
35.plot: Goku and his body are reunited, but the noble Saiyan is severely injured and unable to fight. A Namekian messenger rushes to assist Gohan and Krillin in summoning Shenron, but there's no guarantee he'll arrive before Frieza.

36.title: An Enraged Freeza Draws Near! Porunga... Grant This Wish!
36.plot: Kami and King Kai concoct a plan to restore the wish-granting power of the Namekian Dragon Balls, and Goku continues his epic battle with the villainous Frieza!

37.title: A Nightmarish Super Transformation! Freeza's Battle Power Reaches One Million
37.plot: Piccolo is resurrected and ready to rumble, but his arrival is delayed by an encounter with a dying Namekian. Meanwhile, Vegeta prepares to throw down with Frieza, but the Saiyan prince may be badly overmatched.

38.title: Freeza Bares His Fangs! Transcendent Power Attacks Gohan
38.plot: Vegeta is impressed by Gohan's furious outburst after Frieza strikes a death blow against Krillin. The two Saiyans work together to defeat the monster, but even their combined powers won't be enough spare their lives!

39.title: The Reborn Piccolo Arrives! A Furious Freeza's 2nd Transformation
39.plot: Piccolo joins the battle in progress and quickly attacks Frieza with the strength of two Namekian warriors. The powerful villain is caught off guard, but a second transformation gives him the strength to finish the fight once and for all!

40.title: Freeza's Last Super Transformation! A Terror Greater Than Hell Begins
40.plot: Frieza has begun his ultimate transformation, and Vegeta's only hope to defeat the monster is suffering a mortal wound. If the Saiyan warrior can convince Dende to restore his strength, he may gain the power to defeat his enemy!

41.title: The Moment We've Waited For! Son Goku Is Revived
41.plot: Vegeta gives his increased power and speed a test run by launching a violent attack on Frieza, but no matter how furiously he fights, the Saiyan is unable to penetrate his enemy's defenses!

42.title: Defeat Freeza, Son Goku! The Proud Vegeta's Tears
42.plot: Goku arrives at the battle scene only to find Vegeta battered and badly beaten. With his dying breath, the Saiyan prince reveals the truth about Frieza's roll in the death of Goku's father, prompting a fierce outburst of Saiyan pride!

43.title: Son Goku vs Freeza! The Curtain Opens on the Super Decisive Battle!
43.plot: Goku and Frieza go head to head in a vicious slugfest that threatens to destroy the planet of Namek. Krillin and Gohan are amazed by the brutality of the battle, but Piccolo believes two warriors are just warming up!

44.title: A Physical War That Exceeds All Limits! Goku and Freeza and Ginyu, Again?!
44.plot: The bruises are multiplying as Goku and Frieza continue to pummel each other mercilessly! Meanwhile, Bulma's encounter with an unusual frog leads to an out-of-body experience!

45.title: It's a 20-Fold Kaio-ken! A Kamehameha with Everything on the Line
45.plot: After suffering a savage beating at the hands of Frieza, Goku summons the awesome power of the Kaio-Ken! If his desperate attack succeeds, victory will be his, but if it fails, the Saiyan race will be eliminated!

46.title: This Is the Last Trump Card! Goku's Extra-Large Genki-dama
46.plot: When his most powerful attacks fail to faze Frieza, Goku turns to his ultimate weapon: the Spirit Bomb! Piccolo joins the fight to buy Goku some time, but can the noble Namekian survive long enough to taste sweet victory?

47.title: Awaken, Legendary Warrior... Son Goku, the Super Saiyan!
47.plot: With the help of his friends, Goku succeeds in blasting Frieza with a gargantuan Spirit Bomb! Victory seems assured, but when the monster remerges to strike a shockingly fatal blow - Goku undergoes a powerful transformation!

48.title: The Angry Super Saiyan! Throw Your Hat in the Ring, Son Goku!
48.plot: While Gohan races to save Piccolo, Goku inflicts a Super-Saiyan beating on Frieza. The blonde brawler's impressive new powers drive his opponent to a desperate counterattack that could obliterate Namek!

49.title: Exact Vengeance, Son Goku! The Countdown to the Planet's Collapse
49.plot: Despite the danger of Namek's impending implosion, Goku continues his battle with Frieza, determined to extract revenge for Krillin's murder. Elsewhere, Gohan tries to locate Bluma before it's too late!

50.title: Freeza's Do-or-Die Full Power! Shenlong, Heed This Wish
50.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

51.title: Goku's Furious Battle Cry! Make It in Time... The Resurrection Wish!
51.plot: After Goku is seemingly defeated by Frieza, Gohan enters the fight to avenge the loss of his father. Meanwhile, a newly resurrected Dende rushes to make a final wish before planet Namek is destroyed.

52.title: Two Remain on a Vanishing Planet! This Is the Final Showdown
52.plot: Goku and Frieza continue their epic battle as planet Namek crumbles beneath their feet. Back on Earth, Gohan eagerly awaits word of his father's ultimate fate!

53.title: Son Goku's Final Blow... Planet Namek Scatters Throughout Space
53.plot: Goku's ill-advised display of mercy leads to a treacherous final attack by Frieza. As the epic battle between the two warriors reaches its climax, planet Namek teeters on the brink of ultimate destruction!

54.title: Goku Vanishes in Space... Super Warriors, Return to Life!
54.plot: Frieza is defeated, Namek has been obliterated, and the whereabouts of Goku remain a mystery. How will Earth carry on without its Super Saiyan hero? And what will become of the Namekian refugees?

55.title: That's Earth, Papa... Freeza and His Father Strike Back
55.plot: The wreckage of Frieza's body is rebuilt by the monster's fiendish father! Together, they embark on a mission to eradicate life on Earth. Will Goku return home in time to save his friends?

56.title: I'll Defeat Freeza! Another Super Saiyan
56.plot: The bone-chilling onslaught of Frieza and King Cold is brought to a halt by a mysterious stranger with a mighty sword, but only time will tell if this new warrior is friend or foe!

57.title: Welcome Back, Son Goku! The Confession of the Mysterious Boy, Trunks
57.plot: The formidable stranger finally reveals the secret of his origins after a Super Saiyan sparring session with Goku. The oddly familiar fighter is a visitor from the future sent to deliver a grave warning!

58.title: Goku's New Technique, Instant Movement! Special Training Staked on 3 Years from Now
58.plot: Goku tells the amazing story of how he survived the destruction of Namek, and the heroic warriors begin their training for a looming showdown with the Androids!

59.title: The Pair Who Don't Leave a Trace! The Artificial Humans Appear
59.plot: Goku and his friends eagerly await the arrival of the Androids, but Yamcha's confrontation with the mechanized monsters suggests that Earth's heroes may be up against more muscle they can handle!

60.title: Attacked on Both Sides by an Internal Enemy?! Son Goku vs Artificial Human No. 19
60.plot: Goku tries to pulverize the Androids with a devastating display of his Super Saiyan strength, but a mysterious ailment prevents the mighty warrior from unleashing his true power!

61.title: No Chance of Victory Against No. 19! Super Vegeta Arrives Late
61.plot: Vegeta's sudden arrival creates an opening for the others to rescue Goku. While Yamcha rushes the fallen hero to safety, Vegeta reveals his new and improved fighting style - including the Big Bang Attack!

62.title: Piccolo's Assault! The Missing No. 20 and the Future Gone Eschew
62.plot: Goku wages a life and death battle with a deadly heart condition, Piccolo takes center stage in the battle to destroy Android 20, and Trunks returns from the future with a disturbing revelation.

63.title: Pursue Doctor Gero...! The Search for the Mysterious Laboratory!
63.plot: While Piccolo and company search for Dr. Gero's secret laboratory, Vegeta sets out to hunt down and destroy Android 20. Meanwhile, Trunks tries everything in his power to save his stubborn father!

64.title: No. 17, No. 18, and...! The Artificial Humans Awaken
64.plot: The newly activated Androids 17 and 18 provide a display of their unprecedented power and cruelty. Vegeta is eager to fight, but he soon finds himself outnumbered three to one!

65.title: A Cute Face, and Super Power?! No. 18 vs Vegeta
65.plot: One by one, Vegeta and his reluctant allies meet horrific ends at the hands of the unstoppable Androids. A bed-stricken Goku is Earth's only hope, but there's a specially-designed Android waiting to destroy him!

66.title: The Time Has Come to Become One Again... Piccolo's Decision for Ultimate Power!
66.plot: Faced with an unbeatable enemy, Vegeta flies away in a solitary rage, and Piccolo seeks out Kami on a quest to increase his power by whatever means necessary!

67.title: One More Time Machine?! Bulma Unveils a Mystery
67.plot: While Kami considers merging with Piccolo, Trunks and the others discover a second time machine. Elsewhere, Vegeta vows to become strong enough to defeat the Android invaders!

68.title: And So the Monster Makes Its Move... Take Off! It's the Super Namekian!
68.plot: During their investigation of the second time machine, Gohan and company stumble upon the shell of what appears to be a monstrous creature. Later, a horrific vision forces Kami to accept his fate and merge with Piccolo!

69.title: I Am Your Brother! The Monster Who Possesses Goku's Ki
69.plot: The Super Namekian formerly known as Piccolo finds himself face-to-face with the most terrifying monster the world has ever seen. Who is this new threat? And why does he have Goku's power?

70.title: A Devious Trick, the Taiyo-ken! Chase After the Artificial Human Cell
70.plot: Cell - believing he has defeated Piccolo - foolishly reveals the mysteries of his hideous origins. Little does the monster know, the powerful Super Namekian cannot be conquered so easily!

71.title: Attack the Elusive Cell! Son Goku Is Finally Revived!
71.plot: Cell continues his bloodthirsty rampage, Krillin and Trunks destroy what little remains of Dr. Gero's laboratory, and Goku awakens from his extended slumber ready to fight!

72.title: Surpass Super Saiyan! Now, Into the Room of Spirit and Time
72.plot: Goku leads his Saiyan brethren to a secret room designed for highly-advanced training. Meanwhile, Piccolo puts his enhanced powers to the test against an Android adversary!

73.title: This Is the Power of a Super Namekian! No. 17 vs Piccolo
73.plot: Piccolo and Android 17 trade blows in a battle of unprecedented brutality! Cell - sensing their presence - races to the scene of the skirmish in pursuit of his terrifying perfect form!

74.title: Run, No. 17! Piccolo's Suicidal Resistance
74.plot: Cell's arrival forces Piccolo and the Androids into an uneasy - and temporary - alliance. While the Super Namekian mounts a desperate, final attack, Goku and Gohan wait for Vegeta to emerge from the Room of Spirit and Time!

75.title: Unmeasured Power! The Silent Warrior No. 16 Makes His Move
75.plot: After defeating Piccolo, Cell turns his attention to his true prey: Androids 17 and 18. The monster must absorb them both to achieve his perfect form, but Android 16 still stands in his way!

76.title: Tenshinhan's Do-or-Die Shin Kikoho! Save Your Brother-in-Arms, Son Goku
76.plot: Desperate to help Android 18 escape, Tien places his own life at risk in an unwinnable battle with the monster Cell. When the three-eyed warrior's power quickly fades, he'll need a lift from a friend to avoid a gruesome end!

77.title: Super Saiyan Surpassed! The Daring Vegeta Strikes Cell
77.plot: Vegeta puts his new powers to the test in a shocking slugfest with Cell. Back in the Room of Spirit and Time, Goku attempts to teach Gohan the secret to a Super Saiyan transformation!

78.title: Cell's Surging Resentment! Krillin, Destroy No. 18
78.plot: Vegeta is fighting Cell, can he destroy him before he combines with No.18? With the emergency shutdown in hand - can Krillin shut down No.18?

79.title: And So, the Situation Takes a Turn for the Worst... Cell Attacks No. 18!

imdb.plot outline: In February of 2009, Toei Animation announced that as an honor to 20 years of Dragon Ball Z, they will begin the production of a renewed DragonBall Z, named Dragon Ball Kai. This new anime chronicles the plot of DBZ and consists of parts from the original anime which are edited to a better quality and with new voices. Toei Animation also confirmed that the plot of DBK will be closer to manga style.
imdb.title: Dragon Ball Z Kai
plot: An HD and enhanced remaster of Dragon Ball Z.

In February of 2009, Toei Animation announced that as an honor to 20 years of Dragon Ball Z, they will begin the production of a renewed DragonBall Z, named Dragon Ball Kai. This new anime chronicles the plot of DBZ and consists of parts from the original anime which are edited to a better quality and with new voices. Toei Animation also confirmed that the plot of DBK will be closer to manga style.::dreamian
